thread.title: Vin Diesel features in The Last Witch Hunter trailer
thread.title_full: Vin Diesel features in The Last Witch Hunter trailer

author: Wires English | Press Trust of India
title: Vin Diesel features in The Last Witch Hunter trailer
text:
Comments 
Los Angeles, Oct 8: Hollywood star Vin Diesel journeys beyond good and evil in the latest trailer for “The Last Witch Hunter”.The horror movie sees Diesel in the role of a witch-hunter Kaulder, who is humanity’s last line of defence against a catastrophic plague. 
Throughout his journey, Kaulder must trust in supernatural guide Father Dolan (Michael Caine) and the witch Chloe (Rose Leslie) to discover the true nature of this virulent disease. (Also Read: ‘The X-Files’ revival trailer released) 
The film produced by Diesel is being brought to the screen by filmmaker Breck Eisner, director of 2010 horror movie “The Crazies”.“The Last Witch Hunter” opens on October 21 in the UK and October 23 in the US.
